name: NavigationMenuPortalPrimitive
description: Portal component that renders submenu content outside the DOM hierarchy.

props.name: container
props.description: A parent element to render the portal element into.

props.name: keepMounted
props.description: Whether to keep the portal mounted in the DOM while the popup is hidden.
